description: Privacy policy configuration for a business. A business can configure either an external URL link to their privacy policy page, or inline text content displayed in a modal. This is a singleton resource - each business has at most one privacy policy configuration.

business_uid.description: Unique identifier of the business that owns this privacy policy.

type.description: The type of privacy policy configuration. 'link': External URL pointing to the business's privacy policy page. 'text': Inline privacy policy content that will be displayed in a modal.

url.description: External URL to the privacy policy page. Required when type is 'link', null otherwise (e.g., "https://example.com/privacy").

content.description: Inline privacy policy text content. Required when type is 'text', null otherwise. Maximum 10,000 characters.

created_at.description: The date and time when the privacy policy was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the privacy policy was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.
